text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Sol uan gumazir igiar an mɨdorozir biziba aterimɨn diagha ghaze, “Nɨ uan mɨdorozir sabam inigh izɨ na bɨraghtɨma kɨ aremeka. Puvatɨghtɨ, Filistian mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorezir puvatɨzir kaba, izɨ na dɨpov mɨzazim na danɨngɨva na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham.” Ezɨ gumazir igiar kam bar atiatigha Sol ginivan bar aghua. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Sol uabɨ uan mɨdorozir sabam asaragha a gaverazɨ, sabam a mɨtɨzɨ an areme.
